text: “Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nguazir kamɨn gumazim, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn uan biziba inigh, mati gumazim kalabus bagha nguibar saghuiamɨn itimɨn mangasa. Egh amɨnim tɨghar pɨrsɨ damutɨ, nɨ mangɨtɨ me bar nɨn ganigh. Kɨ kamaghɨn ifonge, me nɨ amir bizir kamɨn mɨngarim deragh a gɨfogh. Me gumazamizir akaba batoziba, egh me ti an mɨngarim deragh a gɨfoghan kogham.
